titleStmt.title: Caleb B. Smith to Beriah Magoffin
CWG3043

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, 1859-1862

body.p:
Department of the Interior
April 10th 1862
Sir

Under the provisions of the 4th Section of the Act of April 1818 "To provide for the publication of the Laws of the United States and for other purposes" and an act of the 5th of Feby 1859 "Providing for keeping and distributing Pres Docs" I send you herewith by mail 350 Copies of the Laws of the 1st Session (Extra) of the 37th Congress of the United States. Be pleased to acknowledge the receipt of same by return mail

Very Respectfully
Your obt servt
Caleb B Smith
Secretary

To the
Governor of Kentucky
Frankfort
